external_games.name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Cinderella Collector's Edition
Fairy Godmother Stories: Cinderella - Collector's Edition

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Cinderella - Collector's Edition
storyline: As her fairy Godmother, it’s up to you to guide and help Cinderella in times of need. But your whole world is turned upside down when you’re arrested under suspicion of committing a string of robberies! Someone’s definitely trying to frame you, but who and why? With nothing left behind at the crime scenes but strange glass slippers, can you crack the case and clear your name before it’s too late?
summary:
This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version. The Collector's Edition includes:

• Rescue Red Riding Hood’s Grandmother in the bonus game!
• Inspect hidden cabinets, concoct potions, and more by replaying HOPs and mini-games and earn achievements!
• Tons of magic shoes, moonstones, and morphing objects to find!
• Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, music, videos, and more!
• Never get lost with the strategy guide!
